name: Wheat
info: Wheat is a staple food grain widely grown in Rajasthan, mainly in the winter season.

name: Barley
info: Barley is another important Rabi crop grown in Rajasthan, used for food and brewing.

name: Bajra (Pearl Millet)
info: Bajra is a major millet crop, highly suitable for the arid regions of Rajasthan.

name: Maize
info: Maize is widely cultivated in Rajasthan, mainly used as fodder and food.

name: Mustard
info: Rajasthan is the leading producer of mustard, used for oil production.

name: Sesame
info: Sesame is an important oilseed crop known for its high oil content.

name: Groundnut
info: Groundnut is a major oilseed crop grown in Rajasthan during the Kharif season.

name: Soybean
info: Soybean is a widely grown oilseed crop in Rajasthan with multiple industrial uses.

name: Cotton
info: Cotton is a significant cash crop used for textile production in Rajasthan.
soil: Black cotton soil or well-drained sandy loam

name: Sugarcane
info: Sugarcane is cultivated in specific regions of Rajasthan for sugar production.
soil: Deep fertile loamy soil with high moisture retention

name: Guar
info: Guar is mainly grown for guar gum, which has multiple industrial applications.
soil: Sandy loam soil with low moisture requirement

name: Coriander
info: Rajasthan is a leading producer of coriander, used as a spice in Indian cuisine.

name: Cumin
info: Cumin is a major spice crop in Rajasthan, known for its strong flavor.

name: Garlic
info: Garlic is widely grown in Rajasthan and used in cooking and medicine.
soil: Sandy loam with good organic content
